description: Your cluster's installation is blocked by a networking misconfiguration. Please review the network configuration, and try re-installing the cluster. VPC requirements are described in the documentation: https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_openshift_service_on_aws/4/html/prepare_your_environment/rosa-sts-aws-prereqs#rosa-vpc_rosa-sts-aws-prereqs#.
